page.title: 10LEISURE ACTIVITIES, EGERTON
page.content: The villagers involve themselves in the local activities.48% involve themselves regularly in sport, and the cricket, sailing and golf facilities are well used, as are the associated sociasl clubs. Walmsley Operatic Society holds three show a year, and the schools hold regular dances and charity functions.The public houses are regularly used by 20% of adults. The countryside is well visited as 79% regularly walk in the area. Residents enjoy home entertainment and 87% regularly watch television, and 80% enjoy gardening. Most regularly visit Bolton and Manchester for additional entertaiment or sporting activities, and 23% regularly visit the theatre or cinema.
